Stairs.title: Stairs to the Level 4
Stairs.description: This leads back to north side of Level 4.

Stairs.title: Stairs to the Level 4
Stairs.description: This leads back to center island of Level 4.

Breakable Walls.title: Breakable Wall
Breakable Walls.description: Left click to break the wall.

Waystar.title: Waystar
Waystar.description: Summons a moongate to Colony for a short duration

Shrine.title: Justice Shrine
Shrine.description: Bring the Justice Staff to the Druid here. You can find the staff at randoms encounters containing two Ratmen and a corpse. Turn in the staff and you will get a key to take to the Hall of Virtue on Level 4 for your reward.

Traps.title: Justice Ambush
Traps.description: You will be ambushed by many Apostate soldiers here if you are carrying the Justice staff. This will leave you unable to move from some time.
